summary: In 1700s Austria, a witch-hunter's apprentice has doubts about the righteousness of witch-hunting when he witnesses the brutality, the injustice, the falsehood, the torture and the arbitrary killing that go with the job.
cast: Herbert Lom|Udo Kier|Olivera Katarina|Reggie Nalder|Herbert Fux|Johannes Buzalski|Michael Maien|Gaby Fuchs|Ingeborg Schöner|Adrian Hoven|Günter Clemens|Doris von Danwitz|Dorothea Carrera|Marlies Petersen|Bob Gerry|Percy Hoven|Friedrich Schoenfelder|Emile Stemmler
title: Las torturas de la inquisición
